sentences.english: The boss won’t bother scolding you if he wants to fire you.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“如果老板要炒你鱿鱼，就不会费劲去责骂你。

sentences.english: They also eat animal cephalopods, including squid and octopus.
sentences.chinese: 它们还吃头足纲动物，包括鱿鱼和章鱼。

sentences.english: Therapeutic effects of squid ink melanin-Fe on iron deficiency anemia rats;
sentences.chinese: 目的比较鱿鱼墨黑色素和黑色素铁的自由基清除活性。

sentences.english: Serve risotto topped with calamari and drizzled with any remaining lemon vinaigrette.
sentences.chinese: 装盆时在米饭旁放上鱿鱼，并淋上剩余的柠檬香料汁。

sentences.english: I heard that the anchorman of the DBD TV network's evening news got fired.
sentences.chinese: 我听说DBD电视网的晚间新闻主播被炒鱿鱼。

sentences.english: We also spent a late night squid fishing on the open ocean under a crescent moon.
sentences.chinese: 更于一个夜晚，在一轮明月下，无涯海面上网补鱿鱼。

sentences.english: I haven't gotten any more squid on deck recently.
sentences.chinese: 顺便报告一下，鱿鱼已经有阵子没来拜访我了。

sentences.english: He got fired because he slacked off at work.
sentences.chinese: 他因为在工作中偷懒被炒了鱿鱼。

sentences.english: Paul was always bad-mouthing his superiors until his boss threatened to fire him.
sentences.chinese: 老板威胁要炒保罗鱿鱼，他才停止说领导的坏话。

sentences.english: Louis: And I'd like a grilled squid on a stick if we can find it.
sentences.chinese: 假如我们能找到烤鱿鱼的话，我也想来一份。

sentences.english: Feinstein refused to get in line, was sacked and eventually left the party.
sentences.chinese: 费恩斯坦拒绝妥协，因此被炒了鱿鱼，并最终退党。

sentences.english: Tomato, mozzarella , Prawns, squid, mussels, scallops and clams.
sentences.chinese: 番茄，把发落水牛芝士，虾，鱿鱼，蚌类。

sentences.english: Squids and cuttlefish suck water into their bodies and then squirt it out.
sentences.chinese: 鱿鱼及墨鱼吸吮水变成他们的尸体，然后喷射出来。

sentences.english: Actor and comedian Gilbert Gottfried was fired by Aflac after tweeting jokes about the earthquake and tsunami in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一位喜剧演员因为对日本地震的不敬言辞被炒了鱿鱼。

sentences.english: Dried cuttlefish is a tasty snack.
sentences.chinese: 鱿鱼丝是很好吃的点心。

definition: fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
